name: Set Us Up The Bomb
description:
My Team, The Cool Cat's, attempt for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

The theme was "Out of Control"

Our idea was to make a game where you guide a bomb through an enemy base. objects would bounce off of each other, everything would be trying to stop you or prematurely detonate the bomb, and you would have to fight your way through guards, turrets, doors, debris and terminals using an extremely haphazard control scheme. Our game fit the them by forcing the play to juggle more things than they would comfortably be able to, hence being "out of control."

unfortunately, we weren't able to submit in time, so we didn't get in. but we had a lot of fun making the game and learned a lot.
